TextView.android:text: This app is a mobile version of mythoughtspot.ca designed by students, for students. The services offered by this app: Legal and Financial - Health and Social Services - Recreating and Culture - Family and Friends - Spirituality and Wellbeing - Work and school - Sex and Relationships This app runs on the Android platform and requires an Android 4.0 device.

Chatroom: Provides an anonymous chatroom for uyou to communicate with another user Favourites: Save your favorite locations here Suggest a Place: If you have discovered a cool place to relax, or a place where their services helped you, please share this place with the rest of the ThoughtSpot community by choosing this option

Select a category and pick a place you would like to go to based on your current needs To select a place, simply tap on the place. Once you tap the place, the Details page will load and you can see more information about the selected place MAP - Takes you to Google Maps CALL - Takes you to the Dialing App WEBSITE - Takes you to Chrome Browser Write a Comment - Leave your thoughts about this place Add to Favourites - Remember your favourite places
